title: Avatar Character Loyalty Rewards.
body:
So I've been thinking and I think their should be an awesome avatar system, unlocking new amazing images of characters throughout the game that you can put on display in forums and chatrooms.

Say

25 wins an original icon.

50 wins a different of that chars skin

100 wins another different of chars skin

200 wins etc

300 wins best skin icon. (edited)


it would put a new spice to the game and be an incredible thing to show off :)

what is everybody elses thoughts.

replies.body: yeah ok i propose increments of 50

Sounds interesting, but holy...1500 wins ONE Champ!? 
Damn...

should go 10, 25, 50, 75, 100 etc if you ask me
10 + 15 + 25*
100 would tick it off too quickly. you need goals like 500- 1000 with one champ
250 tops. they are wins not all up
ok ok make it 300 wins with a champ, it cant be an easy target. similar to what wc3 did with your chosen teams, except i guess you would want to collect a few on here.
an average player would need to play 3000 games to get the last tier. it should go up in increments of 100 to 500
nope too easy. they need loyalty.
